headline: Hollywood Is Taking #MeToo To Heart
abstract: Detailed nudity riders. Meetings in hotel lobbies, not rooms. In Harvey Weinsteinâ€™s wake, Hollywood is trying to end a history of sexual exploitation.
lead_paragraph: A basketball court at the Park City Municipal Athletic and Recreation Center has been converted into a screening room, as have a nearby synagogue and the auditorium at the local high school. The roads of this old mining town are gagged with standstill traffic.
